overview.heading: Clifton Virtual Office
overview.body: Looking for a prestigious Clifton address but not up for the commitment of a physical office? Opus VO is your answer. Establish your business in Clifton’s active commercial environment, all while keeping your costs low. For those mission-critical meetings and discussions, our state-of-the-art conference rooms are at your service.  When you pick our virtual workspace in Clifton, you’re gaining more than just an address. You’re also enlisting a professional live receptionist who will seamlessly integrate with your team. This ensures that every client engagement is in harmony with your unique brand, allowing us to tackle routine administrative tasks so you can center your efforts on your core business targets.

faqs.question: Can I receive mail under my company name and personal name?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can receive mail under both once your account has been activated.

faqs.question: Do you use an automated phone service or a receptionist to answer?
faqs.answer: We offer a live, personalized receptionist to transfer your calls during business hours Monday to Friday. Calls made after hours will be met with a professional voicemail.

faqs.question: Can I have a virtual office in Clifton, New Jersey even if I don’t reside there?
faqs.answer: Yes, and it is a fantastic way to expand your presence to new clients. It will build trust with residents by having your business in the heart of Clifton. You can also adapt to better meet your clients’ unique needs within New Jersey.

faqs.question: What do you mean by “all-inclusive services”?
faqs.answer: Our Clifton virtual office offerings include all features listed at the same monthly cost, regardless of the location you choose. Please note that mail centers and some premium locations may not include all options. If you would like additional information, you can compare Opus to our competitors or contact us.

sections.title: Why Clifton?
sections.body: Clifton is more than just a convenient location; it’s a thriving business ecosystem with opportunities across various sectors, from technology to retail. Having a Clifton address not only enhances your business credibility but also grants you access to valuable networking events and key industry contacts.  Choosing Opus VO for your virtual workspace in Clifton isn’t just a practical move; it’s a step toward gaining a competitive edge. Ready to enhance your business profile? Explore our comprehensive virtual workspace options today.  Opus VO, Clifton @ 377 1/2 Valley Road, Clifton, NJ 07013
